content: I don't have personal likes or dislikes, but i can suggest one of the most popular recipes using turmeric- golden milk latte. it is a delicious drink made with turmeric, ginger, cinnamon, and milk. to make it, combine 2 cups of your favorite milk (dairy or non-dairy) with 1 tsp of turmeric, 1/2 tsp of ground ginger, and 1/2 tsp of ground cinnamon in a small saucepan. whisk together and heat over medium heat until the mixture is hot but not boiling. remove from heat and stir in honey or maple syrup to taste. enjoy this comforting and nourishing drink any time of day!
